project_descr: Lokochoggio, Kakuma and Dadaab, Host Community Project

outputs.output_descr: The host community project aims to reduce violent conflict and improve the living conditions of the affected population, mitigate the severe effects of the cyclic droughts common in the host community areas through provision of basic social services and security, peace building and community skills in resource management, sustainable livelihoods and support to income generating activities. The project targets hosting communities in Lokichoggio, Kakuma and Dadaab
donor_name: UNDP AS ADMINISTRATIVE AGENT FOR A JOINT PROGRAMME PASS THROUGH ARRANGEMENT

project_title: lokichogio, kakuma & dadaab host community project
